duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, execute, and own data queries and analyses of first party platform data to make recommendations that impact advertiser’s business objectives on client for key industries (e.g. Retail, CPG, Travel, Tech/Telco, Financial Services)
Develop data workflows to facilitate meaningful access to client data.
Analyze third party syndicated data sources (comScore, GlobalWebIndex, Nielsen) for industry perspectives
Translate data into compelling, actionable narratives factoring in stakeholder input/needs and digital advertising recommendations
Work as a contributing member with Vertical Strategy & Insights colleagues to tell a holistic and compelling story about the business opportunity on client

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field (Master's preferred)
